Example Roles: Quartile 1 band include, on average, a median entry-level product designer, a median entry-level data scientist, a median entry-level software engineer, or a 25th percentile senior business development.

Low-mid quartile roles include, on average, an 25th percentile senior data science manager, a 75th percentile entry-level software engineer, a 90th percentile entry-level data scientist, or a 25th percentile senior business development.

Mid-upper quartile roles include, on average, a median senior data science manager, a median senior software engineer, a 75th percentile senior product designer, or a median senior product design manager.

This top-paying quartile would contain high-level leadership roles including C-Suite and Vice President-level executives as well as top-tier technical roles like a 90th percentile senior product manager, a 75th percentile senior security analyst.
